abstract: In the third quarter, Abbott's Niaspan failed to show the double-digit sales increases that the drug had previously generated.
snippet: In the third quarter, Abbott's Niaspan failed to show the double-digit sales increases that the drug had previously generated.
lead_paragraph: New Abbott sales data shows that physicians are reconsidering whether to prescribe a drug used to raise levels of good cholesterol after a study earlier this year questioned whether it reduced the risk of heart attacks.

headline.main: Cholesterol Drug Sales Slip After Study
